title: Is the client broken at the moment?
body: Everything seems to be taking 10 years to load. I had to close and reopen the client several times just to be able to search for a game, and once I got into a champion select, I was unable to ban a champion and was kicked + losing 3lp. Am I the only one having this issue? I also have already full repaired to no avail.

replies.body: I've had the same issue happen 3~ times today. Really annoying. Haven't seen anything about it from Riot yet.
